```{r setup, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}

load_reqs <- function(reqs) {
  for(pkg in reqs) {
    if (!(pkg %in% installed.packages())) { install.packages(pkg) }
    suppressPackageStartupMessages(library(pkg, character.only = T))
  }
}
```
